name: Nivo Slider Simplified
author: Ajay Sharma

sections.description:
Nivo Slider Simplified is slider using jquery , you can use drag drop you slide to slider , can use multi instance and setting to set the default features.
This plugin uses’s jquery of nivo slider thanks to Nivo Slider Team.

To add Slider to your website

Method 1

use short code [nivo_slider_simplified id='X'] to your page or post or text widget ,X is slider id

Method 3

to use in theme use <?php echo do_shortcode('[nivo_slider_simplified id='X']'); ?> to your template
sections.installation:
The plugin can be use just by installing it by wordpress admin or upload manually.

  1. Upload nivo-slider-simplified to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now go to nivo-slider-simplified tab at wp-admin
sections.faq:
How to use plugin on page or posts ?

use short code [nivo_slider_simplified id='X'] to your page or post or text widget ,X is slider id
For more visit blog nivo-slider-simplified
sections.changelog:
0.1

  1. nivo slider first release
  2. Default setting
  3. Slider and Sliders
